Leveled 2023 but appears unstable. Discontinue.

properties.name: Qui Nhon
properties.description: This mark is a porcelain dome abut 4 cm diameter with fine writing around the edges. It is in the center of a concrete pad about 30 cm square below grade in a small concrete "bunker" under a rectangular concrete cover about m square and 5 cm thick located on the SE side of the tide house. The concrete pad is incised with TC-KTTV, HV-III, 6-1992. See sketch map for better understanding of location relative to tide house.

properties.name: Qui Nhon
properties.description: This mark is a black glass (?) domed rectangle and 2cm x 4 cm. It is in the center of a concrete pad about 25 cm square below grade in a small concrete "bunker" under a square concrete cover about m square and 5 cm thick with 2 curved re bar handles located on the SE side of the tide house. The concrete pad is incised with KTTV, 20.5.9?. See sketch map for better understanding of location relative to tide house.

properties.name: Qui Nhon
properties.description: This mark is a porcelain dome abut 4 cm diameter with fine writing around the edges. It is in the center of a concrete pad about 30 cm square level with the ground located on the rocks on the NW side of the tide house. The concrete pad is incised with TC-KTTV, HV III, 6-198?.  Covering the mark and the pad is a rectangular concrete lid with a concave center sitting loosely over the pad and mark.  See sketch map for better understanding of location relative to tide house.

properties.name: Qui Nhon
properties.description: Bronze dome set into the granite shoreline. The position is on the bottom level where the SWs are, along the shoreline moving away from the tide house. It is directly on the water side of the platform holding the water tanks. This BM is not under the platform of the water tanks. I positioned this BM to be able to be used to connect the SWs and QN UH2.  Photos are in the file as well as Coordinates.
